item.description: I'm providing snacks, appetizers, desserts... byob and byo games if you have games you want to play!   We can have the TV on in the background for those of you football fans that need to watch too!  Please park in the street... thanks!  This event definitely is on, hope you can make it!  Call for directions if need be.  Marion 860-477-0335.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Ping pong/games and playoffs! at Marion's
